i1.name: Determination
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Xin Zhao''' gains a ''Determination I'' and ''Determination II'' stack for every {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack [[on-hit]], up to a maximum of two.

At two ''Determination I'' stacks, '''Xin Zhao's''' next {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack [[on-hit]] consumes the stacks to {{tip|heal}} him for {{pp|10 to 112}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}.

At two ''Determination II'' stacks, '''Xin Zhao's''' next {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack [[on-attack]] consumes the stacks to deal {{as|{{pp|15 to 45 for 4|key=%|1 to 16|formula=15% + 10% every 5 levels}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Xin Zhao gains a Determination I and Determination II stack for every Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-hit, up to a maximum of two.
At two Determination I stacks, Xin Zhao's next Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-hit consumes the stacks to heal him for 10undefined − 112undefined (based on level) (+ 10% AD) (+ 40% AP).
At two Determination II stacks, Xin Zhao's next Wind Becomes Lightning strike or basic attack on-attack consumes the stacks to deal 1 to 16 ‒ undefined AD bonus physical damage.
i1.notes:
* Stacks reset when '''Xin Zhao''' {{tip|death|dies}}.
* Modifies the next {{tip|basic attack}} to play a different animation and apply bonus {{tip|proc damage}} [[on-hit]] when attacking at two ''Determination II'' stacks.
** Since the damage is a separate instance of {{tip|proc damage}}, {{tip|damage reduction|flat damage reduction}} that applies to both the main and bonus damage such as {{cais|Tantrum|Amumu}} passive will it twice.
** The bonus damage applies {{stil|life steal}}, despit not being {{tip|basic damage}}.
** The bonus damage does not critically strike.
* Deals bonus {{tip|proc damage}} in a separate instance of damage when triggered via {{ai|W|Xin Zhao}} against the closest target struck by the strike (equals first target to receive spell effects).
** Does not apply {{sti|life steal}} in this case, including not healing from ''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' 33% conversion for this bonus damage.
** Since {{tip|proc damage}} is 'single target', {{tip|drain|Vamp}} will heal from 100% of the bonus damage.
** Since it is a separate instance of damage, {{tip|damage reduction|flat damage reduction}} that applies to both the initial and bonus damage (e.g. {{cai|Tantrum|Amumu}} passive) will reduce it a second time.
* The ''Determination II'' stacks are not visible on the champion's buff bar in-game.
* Hitting one or more enemies with {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} applies one stack per strike. The bonus damage applies to all enemies of one strike, but the healing only once.
* If {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} would trigger when the ''Determination II'' stacks are at maximum, the bonus stack will instead overstack, and be consumed on the next ''Determination II'' usage.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Determination's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

q1.name: Three Talon Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' empowers his spear for 5 seconds, causing his next three basic attacks [[on-attack]] to become {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and reduce '''Xin Zhao's''' other [[Champion ability|abilities']] {{sti|cooldowns}} by 1 second each. The second attack will refresh ''Three Talon Strike's'' duration.
The third basic attack consumes the effect to {{tip|airborne|knock up}} the target for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
''Three Talon Strike'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Xin Zhao's''' basic attack timer and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xin Zhao empowers his spear for 5 seconds, causing his next three basic attacks on-attack to become unstoppable, deal bonus physical damage and reduce Xin Zhao's other Champion ability cooldowns by 1 second each. The second attack will refresh Three Talon Strike's duration.
The third basic attack consumes the effect to knock up the target for 0.75 seconds.
Three Talon Strike resets Xin Zhao's basic attack timer and is affected by critical strike modifiers.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 52}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 52*3}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the third attack.
* The enhanced attacks present input buffering during their wind-up animation ('''Xin Zhao''' cannot be issued any commands until after it ends).

effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 40% bonus AD)
  • Total Bonus Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)

w1.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' performs two strikes in the target direction and delays the durations of {{ai|Three Talon Strike|Xin Zhao}}, {{ais|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, and {{ai|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} relative to ''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' cast time after {{fd|0.2}} seconds of its activation.

The first deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in an arc, and the second deals {{as|physical damage}} in a line, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit by 50% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Both strikes deal 50% damage against {{tip|minion|minions}}.
''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' damage {{tip|healing|heals}} '''Xin Zhao''' for {{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}}}% of his {{stil|life steal}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xin Zhao performs two strikes in the target direction and delays the durations of Three Talon Strike, Audacious Charge's bonus attack speed, and Crescent Guard relative to Wind Becomes Lightning's cast time after 0.2 seconds of its activation.
The first deals physical damage to all enemies in an arc, and the second deals physical damage in a line, slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Both strikes deal 50% damage against minions.
Wind Becomes Lightning's damage heals Xin Zhao for 33.Unknown value: recurring 3% of his Unknown value: stil life steal.
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the thrust or the slash.
* The first strike will occur immediately and the second will occur after the cast time completes.
* ''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' first strike will always cast from the original casting position, whereas the second strike will cast from wherever '''Xin Zhao''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Because ''Wind Becomes Lightning'' uses an older type of 'healing based on life steal' and not ''{{tip|applies life steal}}'', {{ii|Spirit Visage}} will amplify the life gain twice (+25% life steal and +25% healing), for a total of +{{fd|56.25}}%.
* The in-game tooltip of this ability currently lists the thrust scaling as {{as|AP}}{{bug}}, but it still only scales with total {{as|AD}}.

effects.str:
• Slash Damage: (+ 30% AD)
  • Slash Minion Damage: (+ 15% AD)

  • Thrust Damage: (+ 80% AD)
  • Thrust Minion Damage: (+ 40% AD)

  • Maximum Damage: (+ 110% AD)
  • Maximum Minion Damage: (+ 55% AD)

e1.name: Audacious Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies around the primary target and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Xin Zhao''' then gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.

'''Xin Zhao''' cannot cast {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} while dashing, but he may still buffer it. {{ai|Three Talon Strike|Xin Zhao}} and {{ai|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} can both be cast during the dash.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Xin Zhao dashes to the target enemy's location, dealing magic damage to all enemies around the primary target and slowing them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
Xin Zhao then gains bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
Xin Zhao cannot cast Wind Becomes Lightning while dashing, but he may still buffer it. Three Talon Strike and Crescent Guard can both be cast during the dash.
e1.notes:
* The primary target cannot dodge ''Audacious Charge's'' effects.
** The target will always emit the area of effect from their position.

r1.name: Crescent Guard
description: {{sbc|Passive - Challenge:}} The last enemy champion hit by '''Xin Zhao's''' [[basic attack]]s or {{ai|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} is ''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' for 3 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' sweeps his spear around him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, capped at 600 {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} against {{tip|monsters}}, while also {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all non-''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' enemies hit.

For the next 3 seconds, '''Xin Zhao''' is {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} to enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} more than 450-units away from him. His [[basic attack]]s and other [[champion ability|ability casts]] extend the duration by {{fd|0.3}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Challenge: The last enemy champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks or Audacious Charge is Challenged for 3 seconds.
Active: Xin Zhao sweeps his spear around him, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, capped at 600 (+ 100% bonus AD) against monsters, while also knocking back all non-Challenged enemies hit.
For the next 3 seconds, Xin Zhao is invulnerable to enemy champions more than 450-units away from him. His basic attacks and other champion ability extend the duration by 0.3 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|75 to 275}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 15% of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Pet|Pets}}, {{tip|stealthed trap|traps}}, [[ground-targeted|ground]] [[area of effect|AoEs]], {{tip|damage over time|DoTs}}, and delayed-damage abilities (e.g. {{ai|Death Mark|Zed}}, {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}}, {{ai|Hemoplague|Vladimir}}) will not damage '''Xin Zhao''' if the enemy champion source is outside the circle when the damage applies.
* ''Crescent Guard'' will cast from wherever '''Xin Zhao''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 15% of target's current health)

st_slices: (+ 100% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 15% of target's '''current''' health)
